testimonial.name: Alper Demirci
testimonial.title: Full Stack Developer
testimonial.review: Garanti BBVA Technologies used Humanas to improve their hiring process, resulting in a 70% increase in efficiency for identifying suitable candidates, for example, for a Risk Management Analyst role. Humanas helped Garanti BBVA Technologies to narrow down a large pool of candidates to a manageable number quickly and efficiently by evaluating their skills and experiences, contributing to the bank's success in the competitive banking industry.

accordion.title: What is ChatenAI ? How does it work?
accordion.desc: ChatenAI is an AI-powered messaging platform that understands and responds to your natural language queries. Ask anything you'd typically ask a human assistantâ€”get weather updates, news, restaurant recommendations, and more!

accordion.title: What kind of questions can I ask ChatenAI?
accordion.desc: ChatenAI, an AI-driven messaging platform, adeptly communicates with users using natural language understanding. It delivers helpful responses to your inquiries and requests.

accordion.title: Can I get update regularly and For how long do I get updates?
accordion.desc: Yes, We will get update the ChatenAI. And you can get it any time. Next time we will comes with more feature. You can be get update for unlimited times. Our dedicated team works for update.

accordion.title: How can I get the customer support?
accordion.desc: After purchasing the product need you any support you can be share with us with sending mail to rainbowit10@gmail.com.

accordion.title: HIs my data safe with ChatenAI?
accordion.desc: Feel free to toss any questions at chatenAI, just like you would with a human helperâ€”whether it's about the weather, the latest news, restaurant suggestions, or anything else you fancy!

accordion.title: Is ChatenAI available in multiple languages?
accordion.desc: Yes, ChatenAI is designed to support multiple languages, offering a versatile and inclusive communication experience for users worldwide.
